attributes.action: Vote of no confidence in Secretary of State for Scotland Rt Hon David Mundell MP
attributes.additional_details:
•Scotland's only Conservative MP has been reported to the UK Government and Parliament for staging a high-profile visit to a foodbank in a neighbouring constituency without giving the local MP proper notice
•Refusing devolution powers
•Watering down of Scotland Bill ...
attributes.background: David mundell has continuously  assisted in the interest of Westminster and David Cameron not taking into account of interests of Scotland & her people example Devo max and opening food banks and has no understanding of the people
